Were do u think the food u buy at the store comes ? Hard working ranchers and farmers who actually work harder idc what job u do right it not tougher then a rancher a farmer. Sony is saying that technology progresses. Is there somehow who actually disagrees with that? Everyone crying tears into a pillow that their PS4v1 might no longer be the top dog of consoles should get a grip. Technology is obsolete before it even hits retailers. How do these sorts of stories yield so many nonsensical replies? The heat comments are garbage, betraying a fundamental misunderstanding of the entire field. GPUs get better. Indeed, one of the biggest improvements lately has been *huge* reductions in the power consumption, and thus heat, of GPUs.
You have a distorted view of Gov Walker who has done well for WI. He or Rand Paul would be better than Hillary or obama, failures!
